column7: 2015 surrounded by her loving husband and children. born in teaneck
column9: her parents and siblings lived in dumont and later moved to point pleasant. she attended and graduated from point pleasant beach high school in 1964 where she met her high school sweetheart and love of her life. kathleen worked as a secretary for the principal of ocean road school in point pleasant borough and as a receptionist for family dental care in brick. of all her
